name: Factory Builder: early access
description:
Try and have fun with it and there is no finish so build cool structures and come back once in wile to check for updates.  Also keep in mind that this is my first game, so there will be bugs. Although the quality of scratch games are low, it still took me a week to get this far and I am taking coding classes for unity so you can expect unity games soon. 

Controls  
A and D to move left and right
Space to jump
E to pick up stuff and to plant trees in pots
use number keys to select a block
Q to drop wood once selected
Z and X to switch between row 1 and 2
